dt: {bc}a private or side entrance or way

et: Middle English {it}posterne{/it}, from Anglo-French, alteration of Old French {it}posterle{/it}, from Late Latin {it}posterula{/it}, diminutive of {it}postera{/it} back door, from Latin, feminine of {it}posterus{/it}
shortdef: a private or side entrance or way
